body:
I just tried on my mac:

Benchmark code
```
import torch

@torch.jit.script
def a_fn(x, y):
    return x + y

import time

x = torch.rand(3, 3)
y = torch.rand(3, 3)
s = time.time()
for i in range(10000):
    a_fn(x, y)
print('time elapsed:', time.time() - s)
```

Calling a GraphExecutor (before)
```
time elapsed: 0.12578201293945312
```

Calling a ScriptModule (after)
```
time elapsed: 0.26899099349975586
```

import torch

import time

x = torch.rand(3, 3)
y = torch.rand(3, 3)
s = time.time()
for i in range(10000):
    a_fn(x, y)
print('time elapsed:', time.time() - s)
